name: Bitcoin Manchester
body:
Website is work in progress! The mailing list link is at the bottom of the page.

## What?

Bitcoin Manchester is a meetup for Bitcoin users, miners, buyers, sellers or anyone else otherwise interested in Bitcoin in the north-west.

## Where?

Bitcoin Manchester's first meetup will be at the [MadLab](http://madlab.org.uk/) on Edge Street in the Northern Quarter [map](http://goo.gl/maps/wEgHb).

## When?

The first meeting will be on Monday, June 24th 2013, 7-9pm (roughly). Come along!

## More info

MadLab event page (full details) for [Bitcoin Manchester June 2013](http://madlab.org.uk/content/bitcoin-manchester/)

* Follow us on Twitter: [@bitcoin_mcr](https://twitter.com/bitcoin_mcr)
* Follow us on App.net: [@bitcoin_mcr](https://alpha.app.net/bitcoin_mcr)
* See announcements in the [Google Plus community](https://plus.google.com/communities/104104955582391132507)

Introduce yourself and join the discussion on the **mailing list**: [bitcoin-manchester](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/bitcoin-manchester) (sign up here if you want to receive announcements via email)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
